dt-example.title: Search in the table footer
dt-example.info:
Just as the [previous example](./autoType.html) showed the use of `-init columnControl.target` to insert search boxes into a second row in the table header, this example shows the same property being used to insert the search boxes into the table footer.
The only other change is that Ajax data loading is not used in this example, rather it shows the auto type detection working with the data read from a plain HTML table.
